title: Riot is coming to PAX Australia

replies.body: Ah, of course nothing fun happens in perth.
considering it's only happening in Melbourne, Perth isn't the only ones left out here.
yeah but nothing ever happens in perth ever{{champion:32}}
how do you think SA feels haha. pretty sure we have a low player base in SA tho...
#Darwin FTL
If u reckon that's the case imagine living in hobart tas
Least it's cheaper for you to get to Melbourne than us in Perth.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Logged in to up-vote and agree {{champion:32}}
Same
I've never seen a more accurate post in my life. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Came to just reply that Adelaide doesn't even exist anymore. No one knows we're here {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Where is Perth?
rip perth :(

At the 3rd Pax they had a 10 year old boy up on the stage playing in the community games and he kicked ass when everyone expected him to fail on seeing him, the crowd ended up cheering him on. Don't under sell yourself, everyone has something to offer.
i remember that, he carried his team hard that game
That's really inspiring! Thanks! I'll do my best!
Yeah man the pros are up there to have fun and play with other League fans - ou would be fine :)

Guess I'll say it because no one else is.

Thank you Riot! Even though I'm not going to be able to make it to Pax this year I have been to the league area in the past and it's awesome and a highlight to the event. Pax is notorious for only releasing it's schedule a few days before and it is good to see what fantastic community based events you have planned ahead of time. Well done.
p.s that male ahri still is the best cosplay I've ever seen xD
Playing {{champion:133}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:17}} if anyone wants to join me.
why melbourne, shoulda come to sydney again
Pax Aus has never been to Sydney, perhaps you are thinking of EB expo that happens around the end of September. As far as I know that still happens every year.
ahhh never been to the eb expo tho, woulda gone for once
Ah, of course nothing fun happens in adelaide.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
PAX needs to come to Christchurch NZ, it'll be waaaaaaayy cooler than AUS
why the hell is this in Melbourne, you know why not sydney?
Or anywhere that isn't the east coast, like everything always is
You have the EB expo and basically every other gaming event in Australia, sheesh greedy much.
Shame it's in Melbourne.
Neo PAX Sivir at Armageddon NZ?
ikr I stopped going to Armageddon because of lol
Why cant it be in sydney {{sticker:sg-soraka}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Melbourne is number one city. So obviously PAX is there so welp to all those western aussies

How many Pax sivirs are the limit that per person can take or can I rob you ;)
{{item:3632}}

Well, it will probably not be the same Rioter you see handing them out each time you go by the LoL area and depending on how many days you are at Pax I would say quite a few. If you go on the last day they are normally more generous because they want to get rid of all the stuff rather than pack it up ;) They will also probably give you a few codes each time unless they've changed how they do it.
Fucking Melbourne.
you don't know how people in Europe feel that have never had PAX :(
why is it always Melbourne. Can't it be Brisbane or Gold Coast for once.
